view: ;

<mvc:View
controllerName="sap.ui.study.git.controller.list.ListExample"
xmlns="sap.m"
xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout">
<l:VerticalLayout width="100%" class="sapUiResponsiveContentPadding">
<l:content>
<List id="listExample" headerText="{i18n>ListOfAllEmployees}" items="{/Employees}" itemPress=".onItemPress">
<items>
<StandardListItem
title="{FirstName} {LastName}"
iconDensityAware="false"
iconInset="false"/>
</items>
</List>
</l:content>
</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
controllerName="sap.ui.study.git.controller.layout.BlockLayoutExample" xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<Page showHeader="false" class="sapUiResponsiveContentPadding">
<content>
<l:BlockLayout background="Dashboard">
<l:BlockLayoutRow>
<l:BlockLayoutCell>
<l:content>
<Text text="BlockLayout"></Text>
</l:content>
</l:BlockLayoutCell>
<l:BlockLayoutCell>
<l:content>
<Text text="BlockLayout"></Text>
</l:content>
</l:BlockLayoutCell>
<l:BlockLayoutCell>
<l:content>
<Text text="BlockLayout"></Text>
</l:content>
</l:BlockLayoutCell>
</l:BlockLayoutRow>
<l:BlockLayoutRow scrollable="true" content="{/Employees}">
<l:BlockLayoutCell>
<l:content>
<VBox>
<Text text="{LastName} {FirstName}" />
<Text text="{City}" />
<Text text="{HomePhone}" />
</VBox>
</l:content>
</l:BlockLayoutCell>
</l:BlockLayoutRow>
</l:BlockLayout>
</content>
</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout" xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
controllerName="sap.ui.study.git.controller.layout.FormExample" xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<Page showHeader="false" class="sapUiResponsiveContentPadding" >
<content>
<f:Form>
<f:title>
<core:Title text="Form"/>
</f:title>
<f:layout>
<f:ColumnLayout 
columnsM="1"
columnsL="2"
columnsXL="4"
/>
</f:layout>
<f:FormContainer>
<f:FormElement label="FirstName">
<Input />
</f:FormElement>
<f:FormElement label="LastName">
<Input />
</f:FormElement>
<f:FormElement label="Address">
<Input />
</f:FormElement>
<f:FormElement label="Phone">
<Input />
</f:FormElement>
</f:FormContainer>
</f:Form>
</content>
<footer>
<Bar>
<contentRight>
<Button text="send"></Button>
</contentRight>
</Bar>
</footer>
</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
controllerName="sap.ui.study.git.controller.layout.GridExample" xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<Page showHeader="false" class="sapUiResponsiveContentPadding">
<content>
<l:Grid content="{/Employees}">
<l:content>
<VBox>
<Text text="{LastName} {FirstName}" />
<Text text="{City}" />
<Text text="{HomePhone}" />
</VBox>
</l:content>
</l:Grid>
</content>
</Page>
</mvc:View>
